nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Basket of Hope from the Great Potato War\",\"color\":\"red\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Leaderboard Position: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"#\",\"color\":\"yellow\"},{\"text\":\"169\",\"color\":\"yellow\",\"obfuscated\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Awarded to: \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"IRONM00N\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"obfuscated\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"The greatest victory is that\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"which requires no battle.\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"- Sun Tzu, The Art of War\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"SPECIAL MEMENTO\",\"color\":\"red\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"basket_edition":169,"id":"POTATO_BASKET","basket_player_name":"§b[MVP§9+§b] Shifty76"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
